description: NTS Map: 082J15A very nice, flat and easy short walk around the pond. A great place for kids to through go for a stroll, then afterwards, you can have a picnic! The lake is stocked with rainbow trout if you want to try your luck at fishing!
directions: Drive west on Elbow Falls Trail (Hwy 66) for 29 km. (Be aware part of this road is closed from Dec 1 to May 14). Turn left into the access road for Little Elbow Recreation Area. Turn left at the "Trailhead Parking."
title: Forget-Me-Not Pond
